name: KRETSCHMAR® Black Forest Turkey and Apple Chutney Toast Points
author: Anonymous
summary: This colorful and tasty appetizer is easy to make and great for summer entertaining.
ingredients: 3 each tart apples - peeled, cored and chopped
1 pound KRETSCHMAR® Black Forest Turkey (slice thin)
directions: Place apples, sugar, cinnamon, cider vinegar, and water in a sauce pot
Cook over medium heat until reduced to a thick consistency
In intervals, toast the multi-grain bread in a home toaster
Once toasted, gently cut the crust off of the bread and quarter into triangles
Fold the turkey to fit the toast points and place on top of each one
Top the turkey with a slice of Brie cheese and reserved chutney
Finish with an apple slice and serve
